title: chidambaram
sahitya:
cidambaram ara- | haraa venrorudaram ||



sonnaal shiva padam ki- | Daikkum tillai ||



cidambaram ... ||







anupallavi







,,padam pera vENumen- | raarkkidu vanri ||



,,illai mattreduvum | tollai tillai ||



(cidambaram)







caraNam







,,nalluNar vaakiya | vEdiyar Odiya ||



,,naan maraigaLum tu- | di navizhndiDum mandiram ||



,,tillai moovaayiram pEr kaaNum poojaigaL ||



,,sheyda pin yaavarum poojikkum mandiram ||



(cidambaram)
